3.speaker: PANDA
3.character: どうしたの？　何か考え事？
3.definition: What's wrong? Is something on your mind?

6.speaker: POLAR BEAR
6.character: なんで　信号って 赤　青　黄色の３色なのか考えてた
6.definition: I was trying to figure out why traffic lights are these three colors.

8.speaker: SASAKO
8.character: 違うよ　パンダくん

9.speaker: SASAKO
9.character: シロクマさん　カフェのスペシャルメニューを 考えてるんだよ
9.definition: Mr. Polar Bear is trying to figure out a special menu for the café.

10.speaker: PANDA
10.definition: A special menu? I failed the skills test again. Skills test?

11.speaker: POLAR BEAR
11.character: ああ　自動車教習所ね

12.speaker: PENGUIN
12.character: 大体　あの教官 細かすぎなんだよ！
12.definition: That instructor is too picky, anyway!

14.speaker: PENGUIN
14.character: いやね　キョロキョロしないで まっすぐ前を見ろ！　とか
14.definition: Like he was telling me, "Stop looking all over the place and watch where you're going,"

15.character: 慌てすぎるな！　とか

16.speaker: PENGUIN
16.character: ハンドルを握るときには 手を　パタパタさせるな！　とか
16.definition: or "Stop flapping around so much when you're holding the wheel."

17.speaker: SASAKO
17.character: それは　ダメなんじゃないですか？
17.definition: I think he has a point.

18.speaker: PENGUIN
18.definition: At this rate, I'll never be able to

19.character: いつまでたってもペン子さんを　ドライブデートに誘えないよ
19.definition: ask Miss Penko out on a driving date, because of that instructor.

23.speaker: PANDA
23.definition: That would be an electric light {\i1}(dento){\i0}.

25.speaker: PENGUIN
25.definition: I said "date!" I wonder how I can make her mine?

27.speaker: PENGUIN
27.character: シロクマくんなら　どうする？
27.definition: What would you do, Polar Bear?

29.speaker: PENGUIN
29.definition: You'd wait? I would earnestly wait.

30.speaker: PENGUIN
30.character: へえ～っ　なんか大人だね
30.definition: Wow, you're such an adult. Yes, if you can't do that, you can't become an adult.

32.speaker: POLAR BEAR
32.character: ひたすら　待って　待って　待って
32.definition: Earnestly wait, and wait, and wait,

34.speaker: PENGUIN
34.character: 射止めてないよ！ それじゃ仕留めちゃうよ！
34.definition: That's not making them yours {\i1}(itomeru){\i0}! That's taking them down {\i1}(shitomeru){\i0}!

35.speaker: PENGUIN
35.character: シロクマくん　ちゃんと考えてよ！
35.definition: Would you think about this seriously, Polar Bear?!

36.speaker: POLAR BEAR
36.character: ペンギンさん見てて思ったんだけど…
36.definition: I just had an idea, looking at you, Mr. Penguin.

38.speaker: POLAR BEAR
38.character: 笹子さん　パフェフェアーは　どうかな？
38.definition: How about a parfait fair, Miss Sasako?

39.speaker: SASAKO
39.character: パフェですか　いいですね

40.speaker: PENGUIN
40.character: 何それ？　デートと全然関係ないよね
40.definition: What the heck? That has nothing to do with dates.

41.speaker: PENGUIN
41.character: どこをどうすれば　そうなるの？
41.definition: How in the world did you get to that subject?

42.speaker: SASAKO
42.character: さっきまでスペシャルメニューの話を してたんですけど
42.definition: We were just talking about making a special menu,

43.speaker: SASAKO
43.character: なかなか決まらなくて
43.definition: but we couldn't figure out what it should be.

44.speaker: PENGUIN
44.character: スペシャルメニューでパフェ？
44.definition: So your special menu is going to have parfaits?

46.speaker: SASAKO
46.character: パフェはいいですけど

47.speaker: SASAKO
47.character: パフェフェアーって なんか言いづらいですよね
47.definition: but isn't "parfait fair" a bit hard to say?

52.speaker: POLAR BEAR
52.character: イチゴパフェ　バナナパフェ　チョコパフェ
52.definition: Strawberry parfait, banana parfait, chocolate parfait.

53.speaker: POLAR BEAR
53.character: 間違いはないけど　フェアなのに 定番だけじゃつまらない
53.definition: These are definitely parfaits, but it'd be boring to have just the normal lineup for the fair. Hmm, special parfaits, huh?

56.speaker: POLAR BEAR
56.character: をするんですよね？ メニューは決まりましたか？

57.speaker: MANDRILL
57.character: をするんですよね？ メニューは決まりましたか？
57.definition: You're having one, right? Have you decided on the menu yet?

58.speaker: POLAR BEAR
58.definition: I'm trying to decide as we speak.

59.speaker: MANDRILL
59.character: だったらマンドリルパフェは　どうですか？
59.definition: Then how about a mandrill parfait?

61.speaker: MANDRILL
61.character: マンドリルなパフェです
61.definition: It is a parfait that is a mandrill.

62.speaker: MANDRILL
62.character: それはもう　すごい迫力なんです！

63.speaker: POLAR BEAR
63.character: パフェに迫力はいらないかな
63.definition: I don't think parfaits need intensity.

64.speaker: POLAR BEAR
64.character: う～ん　スペシャルなパフェね

65.speaker: LLAMA
65.character: シロクマさんじゃないですか
65.definition: Well, if it isn't Mr. Polar Bear.

70.speaker: LLAMA
70.character: パフェフェアーをやるんですよね？
70.definition: You're going to have a parfait fair, right?

71.speaker: LLAMA
71.character: ステキなパフェを思いついたんですよ
71.definition: I thought up a spectacular parfait.

72.speaker: LLAMA
72.character: パフェなのに　とってもヘルシーなんです
72.definition: It's a parfait, but it's very healthy.

75.speaker: LLAMA
75.character: 草　大盛りパフェです
75.definition: A parfait with a large serving of grass.

76.speaker: LLAMA
76.character: どんなパフェかというとですね
76.definition: To explain the parfait in further detail,

77.speaker: LLAMA
77.character: お皿の上に草がのっていてですね
77.definition: there's grass on top of the plate...

79.speaker: LLAMA
79.character: その上に水煮の草が のっていていてですね
79.definition: And on top of that, there'll be boiled grass...

80.speaker: LLAMA
80.character: 更に　その上に覆いかぶさるように 産地直送の草がのるんです
80.definition: and then freshly delivered grass from the fields... will hang over the dish.

81.speaker: POLAR BEAR
81.character: いや　それすでにパフェじゃないし どっちかっていうとサラダかな
81.definition: Well, that's definitely not a parfait. If you had to call it something, it'd probably be a salad.

82.speaker: POLAR BEAR
82.character: う～ん　スペシャルなパフェ…

83.speaker: TORTOISE
83.character: シロクマさ～ん　ここです！

84.speaker: TORTOISE
84.definition: Please wait... I have... something to tell you.

85.speaker: POLAR BEAR
85.character: どうしたの？　ゾウガメさん

90.speaker: POLAR BEAR
90.definition: That might be a little hard to eat.

91.speaker: POLAR BEAR
91.character: う～ん　スペシャルなパフェ…
91.definition: Hmm, special parfaits... I wonder what would be good.

93.speaker: POLAR BEAR
93.character: あっ！　コアリクイくん

94.speaker: ANTEATER
94.definition: I thought of... I thought of a great parfait!

95.speaker: POLAR BEAR
95.definition: What kind of parfait is it? The topping is absolutely amazing!

96.speaker: ANTEATER
96.character: ビジュアルは黒ゴマ的ですが…
96.definition: Visually, it looks like black sesame,

97.speaker: ANTEATER
97.character: すごく　うごめいている！

98.speaker: POLAR BEAR
98.character: いや　それは　いいかな

99.speaker: ANTEATER
99.character: だから　めちゃくちゃ　生き生きと うごめいている　黒ゴマ的トッピングの…
99.definition: But they're like lively black sesame that wriggle! Japanese style is good, too, but...

100.speaker: PENGUIN
100.character: どうしたの？　シロクマくん

101.speaker: POLAR BEAR
101.character: 早く　パフェフェアーのメニュー　考えないと みんなが暴走してるから
101.definition: I need to hurry up and decide on the menu for the parfait fair. Everyone's going crazy.

103.speaker: PENGUIN
103.character: スペシャルメニューだけに　みんな 結構　楽しみにしてるんだね
103.definition: Since it's the special menu, I'm guessing everyone is looking forward to it.

104.speaker: PANDA
104.character: はい　は～い！　僕に　いいアイディア
104.definition: Hey! I have a great idea!

106.speaker: PANDA
106.character: これ　これ！　竹パフェ
106.definition: This is it! The bamboo parfait!

107.speaker: SASAKO
107.character: パンダくんに聞いて　作ってみました
107.definition: I got Panda's advice and tried to make it.

109.speaker: PANDA
109.character: 竹ゼリーに笹クリームをのせて 新鮮な笹とタケノコをトッピングした上に
109.definition: You start with bamboo jello and bamboo grass whipped cream, then top it with fresh bamboo grass and bamboo shoots,

110.speaker: PANDA
110.character: 刻んだ竹が いっぱい　のっかってるの
110.definition: and finish it off with lots of bamboo shavings!

111.speaker: PENGUIN
111.character: すごく緑色なパフェだね(-_-;)

112.speaker: POLAR BEAR
112.character: パンダくん以外　食べないかも
112.definition: I don't think anyone would eat it other than you, Panda.

113.speaker: PANDA
113.character: そう？ こんなに　おいしそうなのに？
113.definition: Really? Even though it looks this delicious?

114.speaker: PENGUIN
114.character: 刻んだ竹が口に刺さりそうだよ
114.definition: The bamboo shavings look like they'll stab you in the mouth.

115.speaker: PENGUIN
115.character: パンダくん…　パフェって言えば なんでも　パフェだと思ってるでしょ
115.definition: You probably think that anything can be on a parfait, Panda.

116.speaker: PENGUIN
116.definition: We can't leave it up to you.

117.speaker: PENGUIN
117.character: よし　ここは　僕のアイディアを…
117.definition: Here, I'll throw in my idea, too.

119.speaker: PENGUIN
119.character: ＤＨＡたっぷり　頭もよくなる
119.definition: It's full of DHA and it'll make you smart.

121.speaker: PENGUIN
121.character: じゃあ　今からだと 旬なアジとかでも　いいと思うよ
121.definition: Well, horse mackerel are in season, too. Let's avoid fish altogether.

122.speaker: POLAR BEAR
122.character: なんていうか　それ パフェっていうより…
122.definition: I wouldn't call that a parfait...

124.speaker: SASAKO
124.character: あっ！ こういうのは　どうでしょうか？

126.speaker: SASAKO
126.character: パンダの頭は　バニラアイスで 耳や顔は　チョコレートです
126.definition: The panda's head is made with vanilla ice cream, and its face and ears are made with chocolate.

127.speaker: PANDA
127.character: わぁ～！　パフェになっても パンダって　やっぱり　かわいいね
127.definition: Wow, pandas are cute even as parfaits!

128.speaker: SASAKO
128.definition: Then there's the bear bear parfait.

129.speaker: SASAKO
129.character: バニラとコーヒーアイスで作ってみました
129.definition: I made it with vanilla and coffee ice cream.

131.speaker: SASAKO
131.character: かき氷で氷山をイメージしました
131.definition: I made a glacier with shaved ice.

132.speaker: GIRLS
132.character: すご～い！ かわいい！　新商品ですか？
132.definition: Wow! How cute! Are these new?

133.speaker: SASAKO
133.character: あ…　いえ　試作品です
133.definition: Oh no, they're test products. You're welcome to try them if you'd like.

134.speaker: GIRL
134.character: えっ！？　いいんですか？

135.speaker: GIRLs
135.character: では… いただきます！
135.definition: Well then, thanks for the food!

136.speaker: GIRL
136.character: まずは　パンダさんから！

137.speaker: GIRL
137.character: じゃあ　ペンギンさんも！

138.speaker: GIRL
138.character: じゃあ　シロクマさんも！
138.definition: And then the polar bear. I think I'll eat the nose, too.

139.speaker: GIRL
139.character: アハハハハ！　ひどい！！　私も　えい！
139.definition: Oh, how mean! I'll have some, too.

140.speaker: GIRL
140.character: これ　絶対 お店で出してくださいね
140.definition: Please put these on your menu! How wonderful! They're a hit.

141.speaker: THREE
141.definition: Y-Yeah, great... Hey, listen to this! I failed the test again!

142.speaker: PENGUIN
142.character: いつも以上に大繁盛じゃない どうしたの？
142.definition: This place is a lot busier than usual. What happened?

143.speaker: PANDA
143.character: 新メニューのフェアが大人気らしいよ
143.definition: Apparently the new menu items are a hit.

144.speaker: PENGUIN
144.character: あぁ　パフェフェアー？

145.speaker: PANDA
145.character: ワンプレートランチフェア

147.speaker: PANDA
147.character: ペンギンさん　ペンギンさん

148.speaker: PENGUIN
148.character: どうしたの　パンダ君

149.speaker: PANDA
149.character: 何も言わないで　預金通帳もらえるかな
149.definition: Without asking me the details, could I have your bank book?

150.speaker: PENGUIN
150.character: 嫌だってこといいかな

152.speaker: POLAR BEAR
152.character: 次回のしろくまカフェは

153.speaker: POLAR BEAR
153.character: ボルトがル語でお送りします
